sentences.english: Our babies were premies so we were even more concerned for their tender skin.
sentences.chinese: 但寶寶們是早產兒，所有我哦更關注他們嬌嫩的肌膚。

sentences.english: Specially contains the plant lip-care essence, which can make your lips more delicate, more charming and more attractive.
sentences.chinese: 特有植物護脣精華，使您的雙脣嬌嫩欲滴，楚楚動人。

sentences.english: Delicate pink mirror with blackish green on grey wall, more show decorous .
sentences.chinese: 嬌嫩的桃紅與墨綠映上灰牆，更顯高雅。

sentences.english: Looking at her, I noticed the delicate fairness of her face.
sentences.chinese: 我望着她，看到了嬌嫩而皙白的臉。

sentences.english: Ultra padded footbed provides all-day cushioned comfort and arch support to your delicate feet.
sentences.chinese: 超填充鞋墊提供全天軟墊舒適你嬌嫩的腳，足弓支撐。

sentences.english: Charming color make your lips bloom like roses.
sentences.chinese: 讓人垂涎的色彩，綻放玫瑰般嬌嫩脣色。

sentences.english: The violet and the dandelion are dainty spring flowers, which could be seen in early March.
sentences.chinese: 紫羅蘭和蒲公英是在三月處可見的嬌嫩的春花。

sentences.english: A blush mantled over the bronzed cheek of the gladiator.
sentences.chinese: 她那被太陽曬黑了的嬌嫩的雙頰泛起了紅暈。

sentences.english: Delicate skin may experience a brief tingling sensation.
sentences.chinese: 嬌嫩的皮膚可能會有暫短的刺痛感。

sentences.english: The colour mantled in her delicate sunburnt cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 她那被太陽曬黑了的嬌嫩的雙頰泛起了紅暈。

sentences.english: Some stem cells are cosseted like newborns.
sentences.chinese: 有一些幹細胞就像新生兒一般嬌嫩。

sentences.english: The Chinese flowering crabapple looks still even more charming against the green leaves.
sentences.chinese: 在綠葉的映照下，海棠花顯得更加嬌嫩豔麗。

sentences.english: And baby toupees, for those sensitive about hairlessness.
sentences.chinese: 還有給那些嬌嫩尚無頭髮的嬰兒買護頭。

sentences.english: Rose thinks she is the most delicate flower in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰認爲她是花園裏最嬌嫩的一朵花。

sentences.english: They were all rather well fed, with big tummies and delicate hands.
sentences.chinese: 他們都喫得非常好，大腹便便，雙手也很嬌嫩。

sentences.english: Her body felt bruised, her lips pulpy and tender.
sentences.chinese: 她的身體感覺碰傷了，她的嘴脣柔軟嬌嫩。

definition: tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
